  • Method Details

    • isVowel

      public static boolean isVowel​(char input)
      Checks if given input is a vowel (german: Vokal)
      Parameters:
      input - Input to check
      Returns:
      True if input is a vowel

    • isProperInput

      public static <T> boolean isProperInput​(T input, List<T> properInput)
      Helper method: Checks if a given input is contained in a given list
      Parameters:
      input - Given input that has to be checked if it's in given list
      properInput - List of proper input
      Returns:
      true if input exists in given list
